issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: Signifies completion of tasks, info requests, etc.
resolution.name: Completed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
I ran into errors when running nodeadmin-unpack-instance on a netapp enabled cloud.  The errors seem to be isolated to EBS instances or instances with volumes attached to them.  The following is an output of the command with the errors included...
{code}
------------------------------------------------
Mon Jun 20 09:26:18 PDT 2016

------------------------------------------------

DEBUG: Your Arguments: Namespace(packed_file='/root/instances/i-a54ffea2-pack.tgz', verbose=True)
Redirecting to /bin/systemctl status  eucalyptus-nc.service

The instances that have errors do not get unpacked to the new node controller.
fields.summary: iscsiadm errors when running nodeadmin-unpack-instance in netapp cloud

comments.body: This might not be a bug.  I discovered the target NC does not have a sub-interface that accesses the SAN directly.

I'm still having issues unpacking ebs instances or instances with volumes attached using netapp.  I'm trouble-shooting with [~jbreiding].  The problem seems to occur when running this command.
{code}
-bash-4.2$ /usr/share/eucalyptus/connect_iscsitarget.pl /,vol-3d762bfc,vdd,euca-vol-3d762bfc-dev-vdd,virtio,eucalyptus,/etc/ceph/ceph.client.eucalyptus.keyring,/etc/ceph/ceph.conf,iscsi,netapp,ccassler-427,,2,,,10.107.2.1,iqn.1992-08.com.netapp:sn.142251821
Before connecting:
$VAR1 = {
          'sid' => '1',
          'tpgt' => '1000',
          'netdev' => '<empty>',
          'lun-0' => 'sdc',
          'lun-1' => 'sdd',
          'hostnumber' => '6',
          'target' => 'iqn.1992-08.com.netapp:sn.142251821',
          'pportal' => '10.107.2.1',
          'iface' => 'default',
          'portal' => '10.107.2.1'
        };
Refreshing iscsiadm session before fetching attached device
Refreshing iscsiadm session before fetching attached device
Refreshing iscsiadm session before fetching attached device
Refreshing iscsiadm session before fetching attached device
Refreshing iscsiadm session before fetching attached device
After connecting:
$VAR1 = {
          'sid' => '1',
          'tpgt' => '1000',
          'netdev' => '<empty>',
          'lun-0' => 'sdc',
          'lun-1' => 'sdd',
          'hostnumber' => '6',
          'target' => 'iqn.1992-08.com.netapp:sn.142251821',
          'pportal' => '10.107.2.1',
          'iface' => 'default',
          'portal' => '10.107.2.1'
        };
Unable to get attached target device.
{code}
I have also attached verbose output of the pack/unpack command.
For this I would say its best to start looking at a more detailed response from iscsi admin or more detailed logs from the netapp.

Please make sure the environment variables are set from this wiki page before calling the scripts.

export EUCALYPTUS=/
export AXIS2C_HOME=/usr/lib64/axis2c
export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=$AXIS2C_HOME/lib:$AXIS2C_HOME/modules/rampart/
Fix pushed to master will correctly connect/disconnect ebs volumes.
This is fixed.  I no longer see these errors.
